scripts.install:all: npm run install:shared && npm run install:client && npm run install:server && npm run install:api
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run build:api
scripts.dev: dotenv -- concurrently -n shared,client,server,api -c magenta,blue,green,yellow "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:api"
scripts.docker:db: docker start webedt-postgres 2>/dev/null || docker run -d --name webedt-postgres -p 5432:5432 -e POSTGRES_USER=postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres -e POSTGRES_DB=webedt postgres:15
scripts.docker:db:rm: docker stop webedt-postgres 2>/dev/null; docker rm webedt-postgres 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean: npm run clean:shared && npm run clean:client && npm run clean:server && npm run clean:api
scripts.clean:shared: cd shared && npm run clean || true
scripts.clean:client: cd website/client && npm run clean || true
scripts.clean:api: cd internal-api-server && npm run clean || true
